data.title: Fun menu, good service
data.text: They have some interesting things on the menu that are definitely worth trying.  The vibe is fun and the service is good.

data.title: Lots of fun and food is good!
data.text: Very loud but very fun for drinks and watching a game. The food is good and service was excellent. Lots of young college kids but everyone was well behaved.

data.title: Fun with a group
data.text: This is a great place to stop in and have some drinks with your friends. The staff is friendly and they always seem to have drink specials. If you are with a group try one of the fish bowls. Fun place to drink, dance and people watch right on Habor Blvd.

data.title: Awesome
data.text: Fun times, we found this place after leaving a small bar, wanting a place to chill at and have a conversation at. The fish bowls are wonderful, and well worth the price. Had so much fun, that we decided to go back for more fun another night. Place is small but way worth going to the 2nd time around, food wasn't all that bad also, had chicken wings and they where really good. I would recommend this place to go hang out at with friends. Clients where very fun and friendly.
